com.fluidops.iwb.wiki
Class WikiStorage

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.wiki.WikiStorage
Direct Known Subclasses:
WikiFileStorage, WikiSQLStorageBase
public abstract class WikiStorage
extends java.lang.Object

Wiki storage with revisions and meta data management.

Author:
Uli, msc

updateRevision

public abstract boolean updateRevision(org.openrdf.model.URI resource,
                                       WikiStorage.WikiRevision rev)
Updates a single wiki revision: the revision is identified by the resource and date, and the remaining content is replaced. If the revision does not exist, a RuntimeException is thrown.

getRawWikiContent

public java.lang.String getRawWikiContent(org.openrdf.model.URI name,
                                          java.util.Date version)
Returns the Wiki content as stored in the database.

Parameters:
name - the uri of the resource for which to retrieve the revision
date - if null, the latest revision is retrieved; otherwise, the revision at the given date
Returns:

comment -
date - The date (null will be set to current date)

getRevision

public WikiStorage.WikiRevision getRevision(org.openrdf.model.URI resource,
                                            java.util.Date d)
Return the wiki revision that has been active at the given date. Note that the date must not match the date of a revision, i.e. the function returns the version matching the date or, if none is matching, the latest older version.

Parameters:
resource -
d - date (if null, null is returned)
Returns:
null if no revision existed at that date, the revision otherwise

getLatestWikiRevisions

public abstract java.util.List<com.fluidops.util.Pair<org.openrdf.model.URI,WikiStorage.WikiRevision>> getLatestWikiRevisions()
Returns:
mapping from wiki pages to their latest revisions
